resource.chars:
To the Council of the Royal Soc
______________

I recommend Dr Carpenter's paper on [?] to be printed in the Transactions. Though written, as it appears to me, in too diffuse a style, I cannot point any particular portion which could be condensed. With respect to the publication of the very beautiful drawing, I feel much difficulty: their cost, I apprehend, would be very great, & their does not seem to me sufficient new matter

To the Council of the Royal Soc
______________

I recommend Dr Carpenter's paper
on Orbitalites to be printed
in the Transactions. Though written,
as it appears to me, in too
diffuse a style, I cannot
point any particular portion
which could be condensed.
With respect to the publication of the very beautiful drawing,
I feel much difficulty: their
cost, I apprehend, would be 
very great, & there does not seem to me sufficient new matter
